p: Irradiation was performed at the National Centre for Radiation Research and Technology (NCRRT), Egyptian Atomic Energy Authority, using Gamma cell-40 ( 137Cs) source. The promising compounds 5 and 6 were selected to be re-evaluated for in vitro cytotoxic activity after the cells containing the compounds were gamma-irradiated at a dose level of 8 Gy with a dose rate of 0.758 rad/s for 17.59 min. Cytotoxicity was measured two days after irradiation. The IC 50 of the tested compounds is calculated using GraphPad Prism 5.
